exclusionRules.passKeys: j k t g w s c e

keyMappings:
# remove additional key for scroll down/up
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>

# Scroll a half page (Map it with Vim Keys)
unmap d
unmap u
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp

# Full Page 
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp

# scroll To Full Left/Right  (Vim: BoL , EoL) 
unmap zL
unmap zH
unmap ^
map ^ scrollToLeft
map $ scrollToRight

# reload (Vim: :e! -  discard edit and reload the file gain)
unmap r
map e! reload

# addition to yy
map Y copyCurrentUrl

# Open a link in a new tab & switch to it
unmap F
unmap <a-f>
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

# go to the next/prev labelled link (e.g., google result page)
unmap [[
unmap ]]
unmap >>
unmap <<
map < goPrevious
map > goNext

# Nobody uses iframes anymore
unmap gf
unmap gF

# not a very useful - let's free the keys 
unmap m
unmap `

# Move back/forward in history - use chrome / IDEA key map 
# <m-[> <m-]>
unmap H
unmap L


# Create new tab (createTab) : <m-t>
unmap t

# Go one tab left (previousTab): <c-tab>
unmap J
unmap gT		

# Go one tab right (nextTab): <c-shift-tab>
unmap K
unmap gt		

# Go to the first tab (firstTab): <m-1>
unmap g0

# Go to the last tab (lastTab): <m-9>
unmap g$

# Duplicate current tab (duplicateTab): <m-d> (IDEA)
unmap yt
map <m-d> duplicateTab

# Pin or unpin current tab (togglePinTab)
unmap <a-p>
map tp togglePinTab

#Mute or unmute current tab (toggleMuteTab)
unmap <a-m> 
map tm toggleMuteTab

# Close current tab (removeTab)
map x removeTab
map q removeTab

# Restore closed tab (restoreTab)
unmap X
map u restoreTab

# Move tab to new window (moveTabToNewWindow)
unmap W

# Close tabs on the left (closeTabsOnLeft)
map d^ closeTabsOnLeft

# Close tabs on the right (closeTabsOnRight)
map d$ closeTabsOnRight

# Close all other tabs (closeOtherTabs)
map !x closeOtherTabs

# Move tab to the left (moveTabLeft)
map m, moveTabLeft

# Move tab to the right (moveTabRight)
map m. moveTabRight

# View page source (toggleViewSource)
unmap gs
searchEngines:
# Source Code
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
bb: https://bitbucket.org/search?account=%7B0a0986c5-2f21-4669-b65c-d18ffe2265aa%7D Bit Bucket
bby: https://bitbucket.org/search?account=%7B0a0986c5-2f21-4669-b65c-d18ffe2265aa%7D&q=ext%3Ayaml%20%20ext%3Ayml%20%22%s%22 Bit Bucket: Search in Files with YAML Extention
# google image search icons 
gi: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s+icon+logo&tbm=isch Google Image: Icons

# map
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps

# training videos 
u: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# my fav dictionary
d: https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/%s Dictionary

# search engine/products/doc
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
a: https://www.amazon.in/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
